name: Pistol Shrimp Escape
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!!

Play as Pistol Shrimp themselves, in a thrilling, mind boggling escape room style game where Pistol "The Pistol" Shrimp gets caught by a mysterious net, solve puzzles and shoot your pistol to escape!

Game was built fairly quickly and so there is no volume slider (you can change your browser volume in windows to change the volume if required). It was also built for playing in full screen at 1920 x 1080 so you may encounter problems if playing at a different resolution.

One known bug - if you can't see the shrimp in the first level, where you are in the fish tank, then refresh the page.
